main_screen.title: Heritage Trails
main_screen.subtitle: Discover the Wild, Walk Through Time
main_screen.description_2: Tap on the map to uncover photos, stories, and hidden gems across preserved lands. Whether you're planning a visit or just curious, Heritage Trails brings nature and history to your fingertips.

map_section.title: Explore National Heritage
map_section.subtitle: Discover Parks, Monuments & Historic Places Across the USA
map_section.description: From awe-inspiring natural wonders to historic battlefields and cultural landmarks—uncover the stories and sites that define the nation. Use the map to find and explore these remarkable destinations.

features_section.title: Features
features_section.description: Heritage Trails is a platform that allows you to explore the history of the United States. It is a platform that allows you to explore the history of the United States.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Discover the beauty of national parks
